title: Sales Performance Dashboard
subtitle: Interactive sales KPIs with revenue trends, top products, and regional performance
author: Tableau Public Community (Sample by Superstore author)
description: A public Tableau sales dashboard with core CRM-style KPIs: revenue trend, top customers, product mix, and geographic performance. Useful as a CRM analytics reference for pipeline health and performance over time.

title: HubSpot CRM Overview Template
subtitle: Cross-portal HubSpot CRM overview highlighting contacts, deals, and funnel metrics
author: Databox (shared via Looker Studio public preview)
description: Public Looker Studio template for HubSpot CRM data that showcases deals, pipeline stages, and contact growth. Demonstrates core CRM analytics such as funnel progression and stage conversion.

title: Pipedrive CRM Metrics Dashboard
subtitle: Key Pipedrive CRM KPIs with deals won, activities, and stage conversion trends
author: Databox
description: A gallery page with public, no-login example dashboards for Pipedrive CRM, including deals won, pipeline value, and activity tracking. Useful for benchmarking CRM reporting patterns.

title: Zoho CRM Sales Pipeline Template
subtitle: Deals by stage, owner, and value with conversion-focused visuals for Zoho CRM
author: Porter Metrics
description: Public Looker Studio report demonstrating Zoho CRM pipeline analysis: deals by stage and owner, expected revenue, and win rates. Helps illustrate CRM analytics structure for Zoho users.

title: Salesforce-style Pipeline & Forecast
subtitle: Pipeline value, forecast categories, and win rates inspired by CRM analytics
author: Tableau Public Community
description: An open Tableau Public dashboard that emulates CRM pipeline and forecasting views, including current pipeline value by stage and historical win rates.

title: HubSpot Sales Funnel & Deals
subtitle: HubSpot CRM deals pipeline, stage velocity, and conversion visualization
author: Databox
description: Curated public examples focused on HubSpot CRM analytics: funnel metrics, deals by stage, velocity, and pipeline value—useful for CRM reporting inspiration.

title: CRM Leads & Opportunities Overview
subtitle: Lead sources, MQL-to-SQL rates, and opportunity performance in one view
author: Looker Studio Community
description: Public demo of CRM-style lead and opportunity analytics: lead source mix, MQL-SQL progression, and opportunity outcomes for pipeline health monitoring.

title: Customer Success Health (CRM)
subtitle: Renewals, churn risk, and account health metrics aligned to CRM accounts
author: Tableau Public Community
description: A CRM-adjacent customer success dashboard tracking renewals, churn risk, and account health indicators—useful for post-sale CRM analytics.
